name: vscode-file-header-comment-helper
displayName: File-Header-Comment Helper for Visual Studio Code
description: An extension [for Visual Studio Code], that was created to help simplify the task of adding file-header comments to source code.

fileHeaderCommentHelper.projectSettings.title: File-Header-Comment Helper project settings
fileHeaderCommentHelper.projectSettings.description: This object can be used to change different project-specific settings, such as what the name of the project is.

projectName.description: When null, the name of the project will be figured out by the extension. Providing a string value, prevents the extension from trying to figure out what the name of the project is.

template.description:
The template that will be used when inserting the comment into a file.
Each item in the array will be placed on it's own line.

Flags such as $(projectName) and $(currentFile) will be replaced with their corresponding value.
